org.apache.flink.graph.library.metric.undirected

类 VertexMetrics<K extends java.lang.Comparable<K>,VV,EV>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.graph.GraphAnalyticBase<K,VV,EV,VertexMetrics.Result>
      • org.apache.flink.graph.library.metric.undirected.VertexMetrics<K,VV,EV>
  • 类型参数:
    K - graph ID type
    VV - vertex value type
    EV - edge value type
    所有已实现的接口:
    GraphAnalytic<K,VV,EV,VertexMetrics.Result>

    public class VertexMetrics<K extends java.lang.Comparable<K>,VV,EV>
extends GraphAnalyticBase<K,VV,EV,VertexMetrics.Result>
    Compute the following vertex metrics in an undirected graph. - number of vertices - number of edges - average degree - number of triplets - maximum degree - maximum number of triplets

    • 嵌套类概要

      限定符和类型 类和说明

      Wraps vertex metrics.
      private static class  VertexMetrics.VertexMetricsHelper<T>
      Helper class to collect vertex metrics.

    • 方法详细资料

      • setIncludeZeroDegreeVertices

        public VertexMetrics<K,VV,EV> setIncludeZeroDegreeVertices(boolean includeZeroDegreeVertices)
        By default only the edge set is processed for the computation of degree. When this flag is set an additional join is performed against the vertex set in order to output vertices with a degree of zero.
        参数:
        includeZeroDegreeVertices - whether to output vertices with a degree of zero
        返回:
        this

      • setReduceOnTargetId

        public VertexMetrics<K,VV,EV> setReduceOnTargetId(boolean reduceOnTargetId)
        The degree can be counted from either the edge source or target IDs. By default the source IDs are counted. Reducing on target IDs may optimize the algorithm if the input edge list is sorted by target ID.
        参数:
        reduceOnTargetId - set to true if the input edge list is sorted by target ID
        返回:
        this

      • run

        public VertexMetrics<K,VV,EV> run(Graph<K,VV,EV> input)
                           throws java.lang.Exception
        从接口复制的说明: GraphAnalytic
        All GraphAnalytic processing must be terminated by an OutputFormat. Rather than obtained via accumulators rather than returned by a DataSet.
        指定者:
        run 在接口中 GraphAnalytic<K extends java.lang.Comparable<K>,VV,EV,VertexMetrics.Result>
        覆盖:
        run 在类中 GraphAnalyticBase<K extends java.lang.Comparable<K>,VV,EV,VertexMetrics.Result>
        参数:
        input - input graph
        返回:
        this
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception

      • getResult

        public VertexMetrics.Result getResult()
        从接口复制的说明: GraphAnalytic
        This method must be called after the program has executed. 1) "run" analytics and algorithms 2) call ExecutionEnvironment.execute() 3) get analytic results
        返回:
        the result
